Description: Introduction to HTML, basic structure, and tags like <html>, <head>, <body>.
Projects: Build a simple personal webpage with HTML structure.

What is the role of the <title> tag? 6. What are meta tags in HTML? 7. How do you add comments in HTML? 8. What is the difference between <div> and <span>? 9. What is the purpose of the <head> section? 10. How do you add an image in HTML?

Description: Learn how to create forms using <form>, <input>, <button>, and more.
Projects: Create a contact form with name, email, and message fields.

What is the difference between GET and POST methods? 6. How do you create a radio button group? 7. What is the purpose of the action attribute in <form>? 8. How do you validate form data in HTML5? 9. What is the placeholder attribute used for? 10. How do you create a submit button in HTML?

Description: Introduction to CSS, including selectors, properties, and applying styles.

How do you apply multiple CSS classes to a single element? 5. What is the difference between internal and external CSS? 6. How do you use pseudo-classes in CSS? 7. What is the purpose of the z-index property? 8. How do you set a background image in CSS? 9. What is the opacity property used for? 10. How do you create a hover effect in CSS?

Description: Understanding the box model and how it affects layout.
Projects: Create a styled card with margin, padding, and border effects.

What is the purpose of the box-sizing property? 6. How do you add shadows to a box? 7. What is the difference between border and outline? 8. How do you set border radius? 9. What happens if you set negative margins? 10. How do you create a card with equal padding and border?

Description: Learn how to create responsive layouts using media queries.
